Items.Title: Application No. C 200077 ZSM (3 St. Mark’s Place) submitted by REEC St. Marks LP pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for the grant of a special permit pursuant to Section 74-79 of the Zoning Resolution to allow transfer of 8,386 square feet of floor area from property located at 4 St. Marks Place (Block 463, Lot 11) that is occupied by a landmark building (Hamilton-Holly House) to property located at 3 St. Marks Place (Block 464, Lots 1, 3, and 59); and to modify the height and setback requirements of Section 33-432 (In other Commercial Districts) to facilitate the development of a 10-story commercial building on property in a C6-1 District located at 3 St. Marks Place (Block 464, Lots 1, 3, and 59), Borough of Manhattan, Community District 3, Council District 2.
